caller_intent: The caller (Michael) needed assistance with signing a document, likely related to an insurance policy or form.
resolution_steps: Heather guided Michael through the document signing process.
She instructed him to follow on-screen prompts until his signature appears.
She directed him to click the 'submit' or 'complete signature' button at the top of the page.
She confirmed the system would automatically receive the signed document after submission.
knowledge_required: Document signing workflows for insurance policies
User interface navigation for digital forms
summary: Heather assisted Michael in completing a document signature process by walking him through the steps to submit the form. The call concluded successfully with Michael understanding the required actions.
